name: Gastro Suite Downtown
locationNote: Heart of Belgrade, walking distance to Knez Mihailova
description: A modern and spacious apartment in the very heart of Belgrade. Ideal for couples or small families who want to explore the city on foot. The apartment features a fully equipped kitchen, comfortable sleeping area and a stylish living room.

name: Stay & Cook Studio
locationNote: Dorćol neighborhood, near top restaurants and cafés
description: A charming studio apartment in Dorćol, perfect for foodies who want to be close to the best restaurants and cafés. Compact yet fully equipped, it offers everything you need for a comfortable stay.

name: Belgrade Panorama Loft
locationNote: Top floor, panoramic views over Belgrade rooftops
description: A luxurious top-floor apartment with breathtaking views of the city. The spacious living room and modern kitchen make it the perfect choice for larger groups or those looking for an elevated experience in Belgrade.

name: Urban Garden Retreat
locationNote: Vračar, quiet street near Hram Svetog Save
description: A cozy retreat in the vibrant Vračar neighborhood, featuring a private garden area — a rare find in the city. Perfect for those seeking a peaceful escape without sacrificing central location.

name: River Breeze Apartment
locationNote: Savamala district, close to the Sava riverfront
description: Enjoy fresh river breezes from this beautifully designed apartment in Savamala — Belgrade's creative and cultural quarter. Walk to riverside bars, galleries, and some of the city's best nightlife.
